name: Assemble war
description:
My maxium game project.Which I make 3D robot model, draw background and character by myself.But story is my friend is write. We are from Thailand so ,if some dialog is wrong in gramma I'll apologize.

How to play :

Movement – WASD

Range weapon – Left click Melee weapon – Right click

Dash – Shift Pause – Enter

Left shoulder weapon – Q Right shoulder weapon – E
